Issue.summary: make only one function to use the committedDataCache at a time
Issue.description: Among ValidateAndPrepare(), PrepareExpiringKeys(), and RemoveStaleAndCommitPvtDataOfOldBlocks(), we can allow only one function to execute at a time. The reason is that each function calls LoadCommittedVersions() which would clear the existing entries in the transient buffer and load new entries (such a transient buffer is not applicable for the golevelDB). As a result, these three functions can interleave and nullify the optimization provided by the bulk read API. Once the ledger cache (FAB-103) is introduced and existing LoadCommittedVersions() is refactored to return a map, we can allow these three functions to execute parallely.Â
